text: hananim-i oegwag-eulobuteo geudeultongchiha-e issneun yeongtoleul jobhieo ga myeo myeolmangke ham-eul geudeul bulsinjadeul-eun alji moshaneunyo hananim-i myeonglyeongha neun gos-e geubun-ui myeonglyeong-eul maghanael su-issneun geos-eun amugeosdo eobs-eumyeo ttohan geubun-eun gyesan-e sinsogham-ila
